Ship
Ship

Class representing ships.

Variables
row
char row

Ship's bow y coordinate.

col
char col

Ship's bow x coordinate.

size
char size

Ship's size.

hits
char hits

Counts how many times ship has been hit.

verticalDir
bool verticalDir

Describes ship's alligment: true ‐ alligned vertically (downwards from bow coordinates); false ‐ horizontally (to the right from bow coordinates).

Functions
Ship
Ship(
char _row,
char _col,
char _size,
bool _verticalDir
) : row(_row), col(_col), size(_size), verticalDir(_verticalDir), hits(0)

Initializes the object.

hasBeenSunk
bool hasBeenSunk()

Checks wether ship has been sunk (hits == size).

Returns
True

ship has been sunk,

False

ship has not been sunk.

hit
void hit()

Increments hits counter
